mapper.select: select hided_number from mgamesituation where to_char(input_date,'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') and member_number=#{member_number} order by input_date desc limit 1

select ms.member_number,ms.input_count,ms.input_number,ms.check_result,ms.hided_number,pi.point from mgamesituation ms join memberinfo mi on ms.member_number = mi.member_number join pointinfo pi on mi.member_number = pi.member_number where ms.member_number=#{member_number} and to_char(ms.input_date,'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD')
